#: A GitHub app that closes abandoned issues and pull requests

?closeComment.#: Comment to post when closing a stale issue or pull request.

?daysUntilClose.#: Number of days of inactivity before an Issue or Pull Request with the stale label is closed.

?daysUntilStale.#: Number of days of inactivity before an Issue or Pull Request becomes stale.

?exemptAssignees.#: Set to true to ignore issues with an assignee.

?exemptLabels.#: Issues or Pull Requests with these labels will never be considered stale.

@.#: JSON Model generated from a JSON Schema with json-schema-utils

?exemptProjects.#: Set to true to ignore issues in a milestone.

?limitPerRun.#: Limit the number of actions per hour.

?markComment.#: Comment to post when marking as stale.

?only.#: Limit to only issues or pulls requests.

?onlyLabels.#: Only issues or pull requests with all of these labels are check if stale.

@.#: JSON Model generated from a JSON Schema with json-schema-utils

?staleLabel.#: Label to use when marking as stale.

?unmarkComment.#: Comment to post when removing the stale label.
